agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Business & Industry TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, March 26, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Trey Martinez Fischer The committee will meet to hear invited testimony from a Texas business leader regarding the Texas business climate and industry trends. After that, the committee will hear public testimony on the following: HB 1097 Capriglione Relating to certain contracts for the transfer of a pet. HB 1519 Phelan Relating to fees regarding a residential tenant's failure to timely pay rent. HB 2024 Romero, Jr. Relating to the survival of a mechanic's retainage lien after the foreclosure of a lien securing a construction loan. HB 2147 Dutton Relating to the availability of financial information of nonprofit corporations for public inspection. HB 2268 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to a provision in a construction contract that incorporates the terms and conditions of another document. HB 2346 Darby Relating to persons entitled to a mechanic's lien on real property. HB 2348 King, Tracy O. Relating to the prohibition of certain employment discrimination regarding an employee who is a volunteer emergency responder. HB 2556 Holland Relating to excess loss damage waivers in connection with the lease of motor vehicles; providing a civil penalty. HB 2569 Darby Relating to requirements for condominium plats or plans. HB 3598 Martinez Fischer Relating to certain unclaimed property that is presumed abandoned. HB 3602 Martinez Fischer Relating to domestic corporations and other domestic entities. HB 3606 Martinez Fischer Relating to ratification of defective corporate acts of nonprofit corporations. HB 3608 Martinez Fischer Relating to business entities. HB 3609 Martinez Fischer Relating to the filing of an assumed name certificate by certain business entities. Bills added after last posting: HB 1097 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
